INSERT INTO PROD_IN_DETAIL_IOS ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, PROD_NO, MAKE_DATE, BATCH, MAKE_PLAN_ID, IN_COST, RACK_POSITION, MAKE_AMOUNT, AMOUNT, UNIT, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makePlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{inCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rackPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_IN_DETAIL_IOS.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_IN_DETAIL_IOS
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE_DATE = #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BATCH = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE_PLAN_ID = #{makePlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IN_COST = #{inCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RACK_POSITION = #{rackPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE_AMOUNT = #{makeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
